title: Readers react to University Hospitals' dismissal of patient
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: Medical News - Today 
Readers are reacting strongly to a story about a University Hospitals doctor opting to remove a patient from her practice. The delivery -- a... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
